level.heading: SUMMARY SUSPENSION AND SUMMARY REVOCATION HEARINGS (§ 23-1610)

level.text: In rendering a decision on a summary suspension hearing, the Board may suspend or restrict the license of the licensee. Additionally, the Board may keep the licensee in the summary suspension proceeding to monitor the licensee to make a determination if the conditions placed by the Board on the licensee are effective. The Board shall schedule a show cause hearing to revoke the license if it determines that the operations of the licensee present an imminent danger to the health and safety of the public pursuant to D.C. Official Code §§ 25-826 and 25-827.
In rendering a decision on a summary revocation hearing, the Board may revoke, suspend, or restrict an applicant’s license.
